thread.title: Life | Watch: Guy organises dance flash mob on Grafton Street to propose
thread.title_full: Life | Watch: Guy organises dance flash mob on Grafton Street to propose - entertainment.ie

author: Brian Lloyd
title: Life | Watch: Guy organises dance flash mob on Grafton Street to propose
text:
At this stage, it's getting ridiculous.
Yesterday, we had that video of a game who created an actual videogame for his girlfriend to propose with her. Today? A guy on Grafton St. learns an entire dance routine and organises a flashmob to propose to his girlfriend.
The Marriage Proposal Arms Race has GONE TOO FAR, PEOPLE.
Still, fair play to him in fairness for making the effort and all.
Bob's Wedding Proposal - WATCH IN HD
Posted by Nelly Kelly on Saturday, 3 October 2015
Via Facebook
